name: Nocturnal Nursery
description:
Nocturnal Nursery is a game made by Shawn and Venessa!

This was made for the Mini Jam 75.

Theme: Wisdom

Constraint: Weight is a mechanic

We hope you have fun playing this! If you want to reach out to either of us, you can find us here:

Shawn (programmer): https://twitter.com/CoopPotato

Venessa (artist): https://linktr.ee/veetheartist

The Main Song was made by Matthew Pablo: https://matthewpablo.com/!
